prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Korean. 

Please PRESERVE ALL the original timestamps for EACH ENTRY.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:08,640",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "So this is my take out and another day on the recovery way."
  }
]

ONLY and ALWAYS return a valid JSON back:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ko": "Korean text"
  }
]
```

response.ko: 이것은 제가 주문한 음식이고, 회복의 길에 또 다른 날입니다.
